# imageScaling

**Instance Property**

The scaling mode used to fit the receiver’s image into the frame.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var imageScaling: NSImageScaling { get set }
```

## Discussion

For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImageScaling]. The default value is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImageScaling/scaleProportionallyDown].

## Aligning and Scaling the Image

- **imageAlignment**: The alignment of the receiver’s image relative to its frame.
